an3.128:1.3: goyogapilakkhasmiṃ → goyogamilakkhasmiṃ (sya-all, km, mr) | caramāno → caramānaṃ (mr)
an3.128:2.1: kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu → bhikkhu bhikkhu mā kho tvaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an3.128:2.2: āmagandhena → āmagandhe (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | nānvāssavissantīti → nānvassavissanti (pts-vp-pli1ed); nānubandhissanti (mr)
